label: 留守職
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: The title to which the Izawa family was appointed by Yoritomo after the 1189 Northern Campaign; later, Rusu became that family's surname. The office handled regular administration in the two northern provinces of Mutsu and Dewa. See Ōshū sōbugyō. [伊沢、奥州惣奉行、陸奥、出羽]
